Package com.avrix.ui.widgets

Class SliderWidget

java.lang.Object
com.avrix.ui.widgets.Widget
com.avrix.ui.widgets.SliderWidget
public class SliderWidget extends Widget
Represents a slider widget that allows the user to select a value by dragging a thumb along a bar. The widget can be customized in terms of appearance and behavior.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected NanoColor
    accentColor
    The color of the slider's thumb and filled bar.
    protected NanoColor
    barColor
    The color of the slider's background bar.
    protected int
    barFillOffset
    The offset between the filled bar and its border.
    protected int
    barHeight
    The height of the slider's bar.
    protected int
    borderRadius
    The radius for rounded corners of the bar and thumb.
    protected boolean
    enable
    Indicates whether the slider is enabled.
    protected String
    fontName
    The font used for text rendering.
    protected int
    fontSize
    The font size for rendering text.
    protected int
    maxValue
    The maximum value of the slider.
    protected int
    minValue
    The minimum value of the slider.
    protected Consumer<Integer>
    onSlideAction
    A callback action to be executed when the slider value changes.
    protected int
    textOffset
    The offset for rendering text relative to the bar.
    protected int
    thumbWidth
    The width of the slider's thumb.
    protected int
    value
    The current value of the slider.

    • SliderWidget

      public SliderWidget(int x, int y, int width, Consumer<Integer> onSlideAction)
      Constructs a new SliderWidget with the specified position, width, and slide action callback.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the widget's position
      y - the y-coordinate of the widget's position
      width - the width of the widget
      onSlideAction - a callback function to be executed when the slider value changes
